title.us: Simple Instagram Photo Feed with HTML/CSS
title.es: Feed simple de fotos de Instagram con HTML/CSS

description.us: Learn the basics of HTML5 and CSS by creating a simple Instagram photo feed simulation. This project helps you practice essential web development skills, like reusing CSS classes, building layouts, centering elements, and positioning
